message: Had to create a new TV topic just to post this: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DZl1QBOW5X0&feature=player_embedded
Sometimes I love this show, and sometimes I CRINGE.
When I Get You Alone: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CuahZj0vcmY&feature=player_detailpage
And I am not ashamed to admit it.
So, the glee covers of Destiny's Child (Bills, Bills, Bills) was sick. Like, really good.
In fact, this week's Robin Thicke cover (When I Get You Alone) was pretty amazing too. I guess I just have a thing for a cappella R&B.
Holy crap! Colfer with the sai swords is awesome!
What? What sai swords?
I love it when they take a song and flip the context around.
I don't like their mashups so much tho.
The bit where Santana goes to get mono then passes it on was good, I like how her character has developed
awesome!!

check it out, it's called Numote www.numote.com

All episodes should be about Brittany. That is all.
